item.title: Joining Warwick in September 2024
item.description: I will be joining the Department of Statistics, University of Warwick as an Assistant Professor from September 2024.

item.title: Working as an LSE Fellow (September 2023)
item.description: I am excited to announce that I will work as an LSE Fellow in the Department of Statistics at the London School of Economics and Political Science from September 2023. I will teach seminars, example classes and practical sessions for a number of undegraduate and graduate level courses in statistics and data science.

item.title: Attending the ICMS workshop and the IMS Annual Meeting (May/June 2022)
item.description: I will attend the ICMS workshop on Structural Breaks and Shape Constraints in Edinburgh, UK in May 2022 and give a contributed talk at the IMS Annual Meeting in London, UK in June 2022.

item.title: Joining LSE as a research officer (November 2021)
item.description: I am excited to join the Department of Statistics at the London School of Economics and Political Science as a research officer from November 2021. I am hosted by Tengyao Wang, and work on his EPSRC grant on ‘Change-point analysis in high dimensions’.
